text: The Wrocław Stadium () is a football stadium in Wrocław, Poland. It is the home stadium of Śląsk Wrocław. It has a capacity of 42,771, which makes it the third largest stadium in Poland. The stadium was built from 2009 to 2011. It was opened on 10 September 2011. == Other websites == * Wrocław Stadium official website Category:2011 establishments in Europe Category:21st-century establishments in Poland Wroclaw Category:Wrocław
title: Stadion Wrocław
